schemes.name: Rythu Bandhu (Farmer Investment Support Scheme)
schemes.description: Direct investment support for farmers to purchase inputs like seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for crop cultivation.

benefits.mode: Bearer cheque or direct bank transfer

schemes.application_process: Visit local Agriculture Extension Officer (AEO) with Pattadar passbook and Aadhaar card.

schemes.name: Rythu Bima (Farmer Life Insurance Scheme)
schemes.description: Free life insurance coverage for farmers enrolled under Rythu Bandhu scheme. Premium is fully paid by the state government.
schemes.application_process: Auto-enrollment for Rythu Bandhu beneficiaries. Verify nominee details at agriculture office.

schemes.name: Mission Kakatiya (Tank Restoration)
schemes.description: Large-scale restoration and desilting of minor irrigation tanks across Telangana to increase irrigation capacity and groundwater recharge.
schemes.application_process: Village-level implementation. Tanks identified by Irrigation Department.

schemes.name: Telangana Micro Irrigation Project (TMIP)
schemes.description: Subsidy for installation of drip and sprinkler irrigation systems to improve water use efficiency in agriculture.

benefits.amount: Up to 90% subsidy for SC/ST; 80% for others

schemes.application_process: Apply at District Horticulture Office. Field inspection followed by system installation.

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
schemes.ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
schemes.description: Income support of Rs 6,000 per year for all land-holding farmer families across India.
schemes.application_process: Register at pmkisan.gov.in or visit nearest Common Service Centre.

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
schemes.ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
schemes.description: Crop insurance scheme providing financial support to farmers in case of crop failure due to natural calamities, pests and diseases.

benefits.amount: Full insured sum on crop loss

schemes.application_process: Apply through bank or PMFBY portal. Report crop loss within 72 hours.

schemes.name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
schemes.description: Provides affordable short-term credit to farmers for cultivation expenses, post-harvest needs and consumption requirements.

benefits.amount: Credit limit based on land holding
benefits.mode: KCC card for ATM and POS

schemes.application_process: Apply at nearest bank branch. Card issued within 14 working days.

schemes.name: Telangana Sheep Distribution Scheme
schemes.description: Free distribution of sheep units to traditional shepherd communities for livelihood enhancement.
schemes.application_process: Apply at District Animal Husbandry Office. Selection through lottery.

schemes.name: PM-KUSUM (Solar Pump Scheme)
schemes.ministry: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
schemes.description: Solar energy solutions for farmers including standalone solar pumps and solarization of existing grid-connected pumps.
schemes.application_process: Apply on state KUSUM portal. Technical feasibility check before installation.

schemes.name: Dharani Portal (Land Records)
schemes.description: Integrated land records management system enabling online property registration, mutation and access to land records.

benefits.amount: Free online access to land records

schemes.application_process: Visit dharani.telangana.gov.in. Search by survey number or Aadhaar.

schemes.name: E-NAM (National Agriculture Market)
schemes.ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
schemes.description: Online trading platform connecting agricultural mandis across India for transparent price discovery and competitive bidding.
schemes.application_process: Register at nearest e-NAM enabled mandi. Bring produce for quality testing.

schemes.name: Soil Health Card Scheme
schemes.ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
schemes.description: Periodic soil testing and issuance of soil health cards with crop-wise fertilizer recommendations.
schemes.application_process: Contact nearest soil testing lab or mandal agriculture office.
